job.title: Web Developer
job.description_requirements:
We are building a team of entrepreneurial and experienced software development experts with a demonstrated passion for DevOps culture. You will work with our UI/UX designs to bridge the gap between mock-up and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides to determine the application's look, feel, and functionality. As a foundational member of our growing startup, you'll get to leverage your knowledge of software, processes and procedures to own the creation of custom solutions and systems.


RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Implementing new, game-changing software features for MD Ally
  • Enhancing and ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
  • Optimizing application for maximum speed and scalability
  • Ensuring high quality graphic standards and brand consistency
  • Assuring that all user input is validated before submission to back-end
  • Providing ongoing maintenance, support, and enhancements for existing systems
  • Collaborating cross-functionally with business users and other engineers
  • Providing recommendations for continuous improvement


REQUIREMENTS

  • Advanced skills with markup languages, CSS, and Javascript
  • Advanced understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and debugging
  • 3+ years of experience developing web applications
  • 1+ years of experience developing telecommunications solutions
  • Comfortable with Agile methodologies for delivering iterative solutions
  • Comfortable with modern practices including trunk based and test-driven development, and software test automation

job.title: Brand Manager
job.description_requirements:
We are searching for a self-motivated, experienced Brand Marketer with expertise in developing and marketing CPG brands. The Brand Marketing Manager is a true brand management position at a high growth, private equity backed category leading company.

This poised, dynamic manager will lead and deliver the innovation strategy for the brand by building white space opportunities and by capturing channel and customer priorities in North America. This role will partner with cross functional teams to define and execute all elements of our innovation platforms from concept to commercialization.

Additional responsibilities include:

  • Lead opportunity development and long-term strategic innovation planning, aligning with our Brand Positioning and Consumer Proposition.
  • Partner with consumer insights team to identify category trends and consumer unmet needs. Develop learning plans that move ideas from opportunity sizing through consumer validation.
  • Lead new products through stage gate process from concept through commercialization including product design and packaging.
  • Partner with Sales Strategy to develop distribution targets and strong sell-in tools, including presentations and support to achieve retailer commitment.
  • Co-lead launch plans with base business marketing team with specific marketing plan activities including media planning and creative execution, consumer promotion, shopper marketing, sampling, and displays.




Qualifications

  • 5 + years of Brand Management / New Product Innovation experience building brands and driving the business including financial management and P&L management.
  • Ideal candidate will be a classically trained innovation marketer with a proven success in consumer packaged goods innovation.
  • Strong cross-functional collaboration and leadership through product development and commercialization.
  • Proven ability to analyze the business and develop strategies and marketing programs that have driven business results.
  • Passion for the health and wellness space.
  • Brand Planning; from key issue analysis, to strategic imperatives, to tactical planning
  • Consumer Understanding (positioning, insights)
  • Oral and Written Communication Skills; ease presenting ideas & recommendations to senior leadership
  • Analytic Thinking, Strategic Thinking, Project Management
  • Financial Planning, P&L management
  • Creative Thinking, Problem Solving
  • Ability to manage agency relationships, write a brief, provide creative direction and feedback
  • Team Leadership, build cross-functional alignment
  • Superior written and communication skills
  • Professional maturity.
  • Bachelor's Degree is required; MBA preferred.
